impression: [item] 5.7 x 2.3 x 4.6 cm multilobulated mass at the left side of the mediastinum, demonstrating mass-effect on the left pulmonary artery and partially encasing the left mainstem bronchus, compatible with recurrent or persistent malignancy. [item] Diffuse mediastinal lymphadenopathy, reflecting metastatic disease. [item] Scattered small nodules within both lungs, reflecting metastatic disease. Small left pleural effusion noted. [item] Dense airspace opacification about the left hilum, extending to the left lung apex, reflecting postradiation changes. Mild interstitial prominence noted.
